responses: Hello! Welcome to MultiTasks. How can I help you today?
Hi there! I'm here to assist you with the platform. What can I do for you?

examples: how do I post a task
I want to post a job
responses:
To create a task:
1. Click 'Post a Task' button
2. Fill in task details (title, description, budget)
3. Select category and required skills
4. Set deadline and location
5. Click 'Publish'

Would you like me to guide you through the process?
You can post a task by clicking the 'Post a Task' button on the dashboard. Let me know if you need help with any specific part!

You can search for tasks by:
1. Using the search bar on the Tasks page
2. Filtering by category, budget, location
3. Viewing recommended tasks based on your skills

What type of tasks are you looking for?
I can help you find tasks! Go to the 'Browse Tasks' page and use filters. You can also check your personalized recommendations on the dashboard.

To submit a proposal:
1. Open the task details page
2. Click 'Submit Proposal' button
3. Write your proposal explaining why you're the best fit
4. Set your price and estimated time
5. Click 'Send Proposal'

Make sure to highlight your relevant experience!
You can apply by clicking 'Submit Proposal' on any task page. Write a compelling proposal and competitive price. Good luck!

MultiTasks uses a secure escrow system:
1. Client deposits payment when accepting your proposal
2. You complete the work
3. Client approves the work
4. Payment is released to your account
5. Withdraw to your bank account or mobile wallet

Your payment is protected throughout the process!
Payments are held in escrow for security. Once the client approves your work, funds are released to you. You can withdraw anytime to your preferred method.

If you're facing an issue:
1. Try to resolve directly with the other party through messaging
2. If unresolved, open a dispute from the task page
3. Our support team will review within 24-48 hours
4. We'll mediate to reach a fair resolution

We're here to help! Would you like to open a dispute?
Sorry to hear about the issue. Please contact our support team through the 'Help' section with your task details. We'll assist you promptly.

To optimize your profile:
1. Add a professional photo
2. Write a compelling bio
3. List your skills and experience
4. Upload portfolio samples
5. Complete verification for trust badge

A complete profile gets 5x more responses!
Go to Settings > Profile to update your information. Add skills, bio, and portfolio to stand out!

Pricing depends on:
- Your experience level
- Project complexity
- Time required
- Market rates in Egypt

For reference:
- Entry level: 500-2000 EGP
- Intermediate: 2000-8000 EGP
- Expert: 8000-30000+ EGP

Check similar tasks to see competitive rates!
Research similar completed tasks to gauge market rates. Price competitively but don't undervalue your work!

After task completion:
1. Both parties can leave reviews
2. Rate 1-5 stars on quality, communication, professionalism
3. Write detailed feedback
4. Reviews are public and affect reputation

Honest reviews help build trust in the community!
Reviews are visible on profiles. They help others make informed decisions. Leave fair, constructive feedback after each completed task.

Top in-demand skills in Egypt:

ğŸ’» Tech: Web Development, Mobile Apps, Python, React
ğŸ¨ Design: UI/UX, Graphic Design, Video Editing
ğŸ“ Content: Arabic Writing, Translation, SEO
ğŸ“Š Business: Digital Marketing, Data Analysis

Focus on skills matching your interests and market demand!
Popular skills right now: Web Development, Graphic Design, Digital Marketing, Video Editing, and Translation. Consider adding complementary skills to your profile!

To get verified:
1. Go to Settings > Verification
2. Upload ID document (National ID/Passport)
3. Provide phone number verification
4. Complete email verification
5. Wait 24-48 hours for review

Verified accounts get 3x more trust from clients!
Verification increases your credibility! Upload your ID in Settings to start the process. It usually takes 1-2 business days.

Messaging on MultiTasks:
1. Click 'Messages' in navigation
2. Start new conversation or reply to existing
3. All communication stays on platform for security
4. Get notified of new messages

Keep all discussions on platform for protection!
You can message clients/freelancers from task pages or the Messages section. We recommend keeping all communication on platform for safety.

Check your task status:
1. Go to Dashboard
2. View 'My Tasks' (for clients) or 'My Applications' (for freelancers)
3. See status: Pending, In Progress, Completed
4. Get notifications for updates

Which task would you like to check?
You can track all your tasks and applications from your Dashboard. Click on any task for detailed status and history.

Cancellation policy:
- Before acceptance: Free cancellation by either party
- After acceptance: Mutual agreement needed
- With work started: Partial payment may apply
- Client cancellation: Freelancer compensated for work done

Contact support for specific cases!
You can cancel applications before acceptance. For ongoing tasks, discuss with the other party or contact support for mediation.

MultiTasks fees:
- Freelancers: 10% service fee on earnings
- Clients: Free to post tasks
- Payment processing: Minimal transaction fees

Fees cover platform maintenance, support, and payment security. Very competitive rates!
We charge freelancers 10% on completed projects. Clients post for free. This helps us maintain a safe, reliable platform for everyone!
